body:
Day 55 - 1330* This was really bad. Also, my man Fad32k17, the reason to why she didn't knew was simple. Multidimensional travel. It may not be written but it is explicit that she came from another multiverse, one in which this rule doesn't exist. After having sex with the other guy, she climaxed and that climax made her consciousness trade bodies with the one in this multiverse, as seen when she just lies there while the background seems like space. She, not understanding what was happening acted normally but then the second part happened and you already know the rest. I hope that I have answered your question, see you next time.
1/10.
(DONT READ!!) you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.

Ok as good as this was , I got one question HOW THE FUCK DIDN’T UNOHANNA KNEW ABOUT THIS RITUAL , she was part of the original gotei 13 he and Yamamoto were the first two captains so again how?not to be rude
